document: THE EXPERIENCE OF THE CATHOLIC DIOCESE OF RICHMOND WITH ESEA TITLE I, APRIL 1965 -- DECEMBER 1976 by Richard J.Fenchak Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF EDUCATION in Educational Administration APPROVED: David J.
